iana.template_text:
(registered 2013-09-11, last updated 2013-09-11)

MIME media type name : Application

MIME subtype name : Vendor Tree - vnd.etsi.asic-s+zip

Required parameters : None

Optional parameters : None

Encoding considerations : binary

Security considerations : The data objects carried in ASiC container 
   may contain malicious code and hence  unless the source is trusted 
   the usual protection against malware and viruses  should be 
   applied.

   The integrity of the data is guaranteed by the electronic 
   signature when present or should be provided externally if only a 
   time-stamp token is applied to the data. Privacy can be guaranteed 
   through the use of ZIP encryption features or externally. External 
   integrity and privacy protection can be obtained e.g. through the 
   use of SSL/TLS or S/MIME.

Interoperability considerations :

Published specification :

   ETSI TS 102 918 available at
   http://www.etsi.org/deliver/etsi_ts/102900_102999/102918/01.03.01_60/ts_102918v010301p.pdf

Applications which use this media :

Additional information :

   1. Magic number(s) : 0:PK,30:mimetype,38:vnd.etsi.asic-s+zip
   2. File extension(s) : asics or scs
   3. Macintosh file type code : no specified Macintosh file type 
      code(s) are defined in ASiC
   4. Object Identifiers: no OID(s) are defined in ASiC

Person to contact for further information :

   1. Name : Miguel Angel Reina Ortega
   2. Email : miguelangel.reinaortega&etsi.org

Intended usage : Common

Author/Change controller : Sonia Compans (sonia.compans&etsi.org)
